raw_body: DHARMAWARDEΝΑ KOLITHA INDRAJITH. (Senior Attorney-at-Law), (Non-Executive Director Ceylinco Insurance PLC). Beloved husband of Krishni, most loved father of Thavisha and Thamali, father-in-law of Peter and Sharendra, brother of Kushan, brother-in-law of Sherine and Dhananj, loving uncle of Dilanka, Dinesh. Remains lie at Jayarathne Funeral Parlour from 8.30 a.m. Cremation today 7th December 2023 at 6.00 p.m. at Jawatta Cemetery. 349615
